content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Stone Furnace Facility at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
– Stone Furnace at (0.0, 0.0) [producing {'iron-plate': 43}, warning: no ingredients to smelt]
– Iron Chest at (1.5, 0.5)

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at position (–16.0, –51.0)
Consists of:
– Burner Mining Drill at (–16.0, –51.0) [warnings: out of fuel; output blocked by item on the ground]
– Burner Inserter at (–14.5, –49.5) [warning: out of fuel] with:
  • Pickup at (–15.5, –49.5)
  • Drop at (–13.5, –49.5)
– Transport Belt at (–15.5, –49.5)
– Iron Chest at (–13.5, –49.5) [inventory: {'iron-ore': 146}]
– Burner Inserter at (–14.5, –47.5) [status: WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS] with:
  • Pickup at (–15.5, –47.5)
  • Drop at (–13.5, –47.5)
– Fast Inserter at (–12.5, –49.5) [warning: not receiving electricity]
– Sink Inserter at (–13.5, –45.5) [warning: not connected to power network] with:
  • Pickup at (–13.5, –46.5)
  • Drop at (–13.5, –44.5)
– Belt Group connecting Fast Inserter drop at (–11.5, –49.5) to Sink Inserter pickup at (–13.5, –46.5)

### Copper Furnace at position (–27.0, –60.0)
Consists of:
– Stone Furnace at (–27.0, –60.0) [warning: no ingredients to smelt]

### Lab Power Integration System at position (0.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
– Lab at (0.5, 2.5) [lab_input: {'automation-science-pack': 23}]
– Offshore Pump (original) at (–7.5, 25.5) (WORKING)
– Offshore Pump (new) at (–9.5, 24.5) (WORKING) connected to the boiler
– Boiler at (2.0, 17.5) [warnings: out of fuel; no input liquid; no fluid present in connections]
– Generator (Steam Engine) at (2.5, 27.5) [warnings: no input liquid; no fluid present in connections; unresolved fluid connection due to persistent congestion near (2.5, 21.5)]

### Pipe Production Facility at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
– Assembling Machine at (3.5, 0.5) [warnings: not receiving electricity; cannot create pipe due to missing resource: iron-plate (1)]
– Iron Chest at (1.5, 0.5)
– Electricity network established via Small Electric Poles distributed throughout the area

### Fluid Pipelines (Pipe Groups)
Consists of:
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189393) spanning positions such as (–10.5, 22.5) to (–9.5, 23.5)
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189398) at approximately (8.5, 5.5) with 2 pipe segments
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189399) at approximately (10.5, 4.5) with multiple segments
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189404) linking offshore pump (–9.5, 24.5) with a series of pipes toward the boiler
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189407) at (2.5, 9.5) with a short chain of connections
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189408) at (10.5, 9.5) with secondary pipe routing
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189414) at (1.5, 11.5)
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189429) at (–1.5, 17.5)
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189430) at (0.5, 17.5)
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189432) at (6.5, 16.5)
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189437) at (–1.5, 21.5) – potential congestion point
– PipeGroup (fluid_system=189446) at (4.5, 25.5) with several pipe segments

### Integrated Components
Consists of:
– Belt connections linking outputs of mining and inserter setups (including a Belt Group connecting relevant inserter and belt outputs – 6 belts total)
– Electricity network formed by Small Electric Poles and associated distribution links

────────────────────────
ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
• Fluid Pipeline Congestion and Layout Collisions  
  – The fluid pipeline connecting the Boiler to the Steam Engine remains unresolved due to persistent congestion near (2.5, 21.5).
  – Numerous interfering pipe groups—with candidate directions (RIGHT, UP, LEFT, DOWN) and spacings (2, 3, 4)—lead to collisions.
  – Mitigate by reconfiguring or relocating obstructing pipe groups, switching to underground pipelines or pipe-to-ground modules, and rerouting the fluid connection to a less congested region.

• Fuel and Resource Provisioning  
  – Recurrent warnings (e.g., “out of fuel”, “no input liquid”, “no ingredients to smelt”, “missing resource: iron-plate”) indicate inadequate stocks.
  – Ensure sufficient fuel reserves and resource availability before placement or production attempts.

• Electrical Connectivity Issues  
  – Alerts such as “not receiving electricity” and “not connected to power network” on inserters and assembling machines point to power distribution gaps.
  – Verify that all electrical entities are properly connected to an operational power network.

• Inventory and Placement Validations  
  – Errors involving output blockages and failed pipe creation due to missing items highlight insufficient pre-placement checks.
  – Confirm target tile availability and inventory levels before attempting placements.
